title: FIWARE - Smart Spot
description: FIWARE Smart Spot entity schema intended for validation tools

signalStrength.description: Signal strength to adjust the announcement range

bluetoothChannel.description: Bluetooth channels where to transmit the announcement

coverageRadius.description: Radius of the spot coverage area in meters

availability.description: Specifies the time intervals in which this interactive service is available, but this is a general information while Smart Spots have their own real availability in order to allow advanced configurations

refSmartPointOfInteraction.description: Reference to the Smart Point of Interaction which includes this Smart Spot
